--- title: "The Comfort Tax" date: 2026-01-11 draft: false tags: ["Antifragile"] categories: ["Daily Blog"] author: "Elledub" summary: "Capability compounds. So does dependency." --- **The Comfort Tax** We pay for convenience with our capacity. Every subscription that "solves" a problem is a skill you'll never develop. Every platform that "connects" you is a community you'll never build. Every algorithm that "curates" for you is a choice you'll never make. The trade seems obvious: time saved, friction removed, life simplified.
